DarkHawk/Perceptor

"Hydras should be informed about the current situation =
in Maximal Base"replied the male while he was dragging Tucson " and the fem=
ale shouldl be moved to another place"

Perceptor replied "She wont move to=
 any place and whoever tries to free her for her cell, would be the indirec=
t cause of her death... But you are right, We have to move  her to another =
secure place"


From: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Sunday, February 21, 2010 6:45 =
AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortres=
s


  
Cyclonus, Scourge and Rodimus watched as the Autobot who was so thor=
oughly
beaten by Hydras and left in a near functionless state suddenly
spru=
ng to life! With a tenacity that surprised them, the Autobot filled with th=
e room with smoke, using only his tires, the power of his engines and the a=
mbient dust on the floor. 

"He don't know when to quit!" Rodimus said as h=
e watched the ruckus, trying to target the Autobot through the smoke. 

"He=
 is an Autobot." said Cyclonus as he turned to fire on the fleeing Tuscon

=
"Scrap!" Scourge fretted as the smoke interfeared with his sensors. 

It to=
ok a moment for thier optics and sensors to adjust, and by then the Autobot=
 was already on the move. Even as Tuscon ran down on fuel the trio was in p=
ursuit. 

>>"N - Night - Nightlight.. . Here...." 
>>
>>Tuscon's engine shu=
ts 
>>down. Clearly there was not enough energy to make his escape, and he =
had not the 
>>heart to leave a comrade behind. No matter if it were a Maxi=
mal or an Autobot. 
>>His headlights dim, as his body now goes off line due=
 to energy 
>>exhaustion.

As Tuscon ran out of power and came to a stop, a=
 door slid open. "Yes Autobot, she is here, as are others." said a voice fr=
om the shadowed interior of the room, "and now so are you."

>Darkhawk took=
 one of his Feather 
>missiles and ran towards Tucson and he Used a stunned=
 gun againts Him, then 
>manually starting to transformn Him to his Robot m=
ode and once he was in 
>his robot mode he tied him thignly. 

As Darkhawk =
finished his work, a figure moved from the room, the ambient light finally =
piercing the shadows as it stepped into the hall to reveal the form of the =
head master unit called Zarak.

He casually stepped forward and leaned over=
 the depowered and now stunned form of Tuscon, "We have use for one like yo=
u." He ran a scanner over Tuscon's frame "Yes, one so like the old Prime."
=

"You see it don't you Autobot?" Zarak said, speaking to the inert form of =
Tuscon. "Our scanners also revealed something else." Zarak straightened as =
he changed the feed of his scanner to link with the base scanners, "There i=
s a minion floating over the old Maximal base, quite possibly attacking it.=
"

Zarak chuckled, "With it there, all your Autobot and Maximal friends are=
 no doubt rushing to get there to defend that pitiful piece of technology, =
possibly even some of the ones defending the ark." Zarak's optics widened i=
n mock surprise, "I'm surprised you didn't get the call."

Zarak smiled aga=
in, mockingly, derisively, "And now we have you, so much like the old Prime=
 and we have a lightly defended Ark and a Matrix waiting for us to plunder.=
"

"MWHAHAHAHAaaa!"

"Yes, we have a use for him." Zarak said as he turned =
to look at Darkhawk, "Bring him to my battle station, we have a treasure th=
at awaits us!"

OOC: I am assuming that Tuscon is indeed knocked out. Pleas=
e keep in mind Zarak is scanning Tuscon quite carefully, so playing possum =
will be difficult. 

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge/Rodimus/Zarak)
